pages.text: $(l:tools/drone)無人機/$將會前往指定$(l:programming/area)區域/$內最近的符合可選的由$(l:programming/text)文字/$拼圖指定的$(l:base_concepts/entity_filter)實體過濾器的實體並將其搭載以供傳輸。$(p)此處的$(italic)實體/$包括玩家，儘管玩家可以按下 $(thing)Shift/$ 離開$(item)無人機/$。雖說如此，被一個你可以控制的飛行實體所搭載有其好處...

pages.title: Experience Orbs
pages.text: Drones are also able to import $(thing)Experience Orbs/$ using this widget; the $(item)@orb/$ entity filter will match XP orbs. Imported orbs are converted to $(l:base_concepts/memory_essence)Memory Essence/$ and stored in the drone's internal tank; you can then use the $(l:programming/liquid_export)Liquid Export/$ widget to transfer that to a fluid tank.

pages.title: Area Limitations
pages.text: Keep in mind that any $(l:programming/area)Area/$ widgets connected to this widget must have an area type of $(thing)Box/$; this is the only supported shape. It's possible to create different shapes, though, by using whitelisting/blacklisting of areas.
